name: Fungal Bulwark
description:
GMTK jam 2020

made in 48 hours, make your way in the old ruins by planting new pine branches, clear your way by planting wood eating fungus.

Left click to plant more branches (aim at a piece of wood from close up)

Right click to plant wood eating fungus

space to jump

R to restart

Escape to quit the game

(you may need a dedicated graphics card. Did not test well on integrated intel grapics so far)
